sources.name: card.style.ts
card.tsx
index.ts
sources.content:
export * from "./card.style"
export {
  CardBody,
  CardFooter,
  CardHeader,
  CardPropsContext,
  CardRoot,
  useCardPropsContext,
} from "./card"
export type {
  CardBodyProps,
  CardFooterProps,
  CardHeaderProps,
  CardRootProps,
} from "./card"
export * as Card from "./namespace"

sources.name: namespace.ts
sources.content:
export type {
  CardBodyProps as BodyProps,
  CardFooterProps as FooterProps,
  CardHeaderProps as HeaderProps,
  CardRootProps as RootProps,
} from "./card"
export {
  CardBody as Body,
  CardFooter as Footer,
  CardHeader as Header,
  CardPropsContext as PropsContext,
  CardRoot as Root,
  useCardPropsContext as usePropsContext,
} from "./card"
